Room.Name: Inside the Garden
Room.ShortDescription: Trapped! As you enter the garden the gate slams shut behind you.
Room.LongDescription: The magical glow you felt radiating from the garden as you approached it is now very intense. There are rows of fabulously beautiful plants lining the paths which lead up and down the inside of this garden, and the walls form an area which, once inside, is surprisingly large. You cannot see the other end of the garden from where you stand as it simply fades into a mystically white radiance. The gate, which has shut behind you, looks nothing like it did from the outside. It is now a solid gold surface and prevents you from looking back in that direction.
